actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to provide that employees of States and political subdivisions thereof shall be subject to the provisions of the National Labor Relations Act.

summary.text: Provides that employees of States and political subdivisions thereof shall be subject to the provisions of the National Labor Relations Act. (Amends 29 U.S.C. 152(2))

titles.title: A bill to provide that employees of States and political subdivisions thereof shall be subject to the provisions of the National Labor Relations Act.
